trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSMKDWEPTRADE2_00952_GEROLT_000_000<tab>Right, time to put these godly─an' now aether-infused─hands to work!

TEXT_CTSMKDWEPTRADE2_00952_GEROLT_000_002<tab>Heh, I'll never tire of admirin' me handiwork. A multi-aspected phantasm o' highly concentrated aether, in perfect harmony with the very essence o' the weapon...
TEXT_CTSMKDWEPTRADE2_00952_GEROLT_000_003<tab>Behold the true potential of aetheric bleedin' infusion: <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>!
TEXT_CTSMKDWEPTRADE2_00952_GEROLT_000_004<tab>Behold the true potential of aetheric bleedin' infusion: <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> an' <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8030202 /var>!
TEXT_CTSMKDWEPTRADE2_00952_GEROLT_000_005<tab>Feels good in the hand, doesn't it? Well worth the drudgery an' staggerin' financial cost, I'd wager.

TEXT_CTSMKDWEPTRADE2_00952_GEROLT_000_006<tab>Yer probably sick to death o' scrappin' after that nonsense with the aetherwells, but don't let me catch ye with that weapon languishin' in yer pack─get out there an' test its potential!
